other_title: Ar Tonelico Sekai no Owari de Utai Tsuzukeru Shoujo
アルトネリコ 世界の終わりで詩い続ける少女 (Japanese)
plot: A Reyvateil can help people by the use of their song magic. Aurica Nestmile, a Reyvateil, tried to help Lyner Barsett by the use of her song, but she can't use her song magic well. Lyner asked her help to find an engineer to repair his airship. Together, they journeyed around the Firefly Alley to find an engineer, along the way, Lyner indirectly teaches Aurica how to use her song magic well.
